title: JPEG2000
alt: I was actually a little relieved when I learned that JPEG2000 was used in the DCI digital cinema standard. I was feeling so bad for it!
transcript:
[Cueball and a woman are both at a table, facing each other, both working on their own respective computers.][Cueball leans back and stops typing. The woman continues to type.][Cueball looks over at the woman.]
Cueball: I'm starting to worry that JPEG 2000 isn't catching on as fast as we expected.
Woman:: Don't worry! We're in this for the long haul.
